page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: Religious Amenities. We have three churches in the area all of which are in Buxted.St Mary's and St Margaret the Queen are both Church of England and the third is the Methodist Church. Rev D.Rankin is rector of the two C of E churches plus one other outside of our area Hadlow Down. Combined junior church services are held at the Methodist Hall. The school has a good contact with St Margaret's. Five children from the top class of 30 attend St Mary's regularly,seven attend St Margarets and ten don't go to church at all except with the school. I go to junior church every Sunday. First of all we have a service then we go into age groups and play games and read stories about Jesus afterwards we have a drink ,a biscuit and go.
